useMockData.description: Whether or not to use mock data instead of the real tracker API. If true, pulls from Lange's Dropbox.

displayDuration.description: How long (in seconds) most things show on-screen for.

scrollHoldDuration.description: How long (in seconds) to hold items during a scroll.

address.description: The IP address or hostname of a Behringer X32 digital mixer.

websocketUrl.description: The URL of your deployment of of https://github.com/GamesDoneQuick/twitter-socket.io-adapter.

preSharedKey.description: The password used to authenticate with your deployment of https://github.com/GamesDoneQuick/twitter-socket.io-adapter.

channelId.description: The ID (not name!) of the Twitch channel to operate on.

oauthToken.description: The OAuth token to use to make API requests.

titleTemplate.description: The template used to set the title of the stream whenever the current run changes.

clientId.description: The Client ID of the Twitch API application to use when sending API requests.

debug.description: If true, enables additional debug logging for some Twitch systems.

pre.description: If true, set title to something about the upcoming show.

tracker.description: Info for retrieving data from the event tracker.

techNotesURL.description: The URL to the tech notes spreadsheet. Is embedded as n IFrame on the Producer Dashboard.
